spells.name: Arcane Armor
spells.shortDescription: Summon a light magical armor on self.

basic.effect: Set Armor bonus to Spellcraft Tier (minimum 1) if unarmored. Cannot be re-summoned if dispelled with non-full stamina HP.

spells.description: Arcane Armor is rarely used in wars, and until higher tiers it is weaker defense than an actual physical armor. Despite that it is quite popular spell to learn, as Arcane Armor is weightless and requires no maintenance.  Authors note: put on a good enchanted brigantine and a nice helmet. No one needs to see your amazing hairstyle during the battle.

spells.name: Consecrate
spells.shortDescription: Spend an breather consecrating a 10m radius area for up to a full day, making it uncomfortable for undead and monsters.
spells.description: Spend an breather consecrating a 10m radius area for up to a full day, making it uncomfortable for undead and monsters.

spells.name: Darkvision
spells.shortDescription: Grant darkvision to self or team

basic.effect: 5m black and white darkvision on self

advanced.effect: 5m Per Spellcraft tier of black and white darkvision on self/team

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.shortDescription: Sense magical auras and enchantments

basic.effect: See magic within 10m

spells.name: Endure Elements
spells.shortDescription: Resist environmental extremes

basic.effect: Ignore minor environmental effects, like rain or dust storm. #TODO Environmental rules are not yet written

advanced.effect: Ignore minor environmental effects, like rain or dust storm

spells.name: Featherfall
spells.shortDescription: Negate falling damage for targets

basic.effect: Negate falling damage on 1 target

advanced.effect: Negate falling damage on multiple targets

spells.name: Ghost Sound
spells.shortDescription: Create illusory sounds

basic.effect: Audio illusion

spells.name: Light
spells.shortDescription: Create small lamp level illumination around yourself or party

basic.effect: Bright light 10m on self

advanced.effect: Bright light up to 10m  per tier on self/party members. Can change the color and the intensity of the light.

spells.description: Third most popular awakening spell and first spell taught to the students. The color of the light coming from the spell can be modified. Research has shown that the spell is way better for nigh-time reading than candles or lamps, as it doesn't cause as much stress to the eyes.
spells.duration: 1 breather if cast as a spell

spells.name: Light Backpack
spells.shortDescription: Reduce the weight you carry in your backpack.

basic.effect: Reduce the weight of the backpack you carry by 5* Tier kilos.

advanced.effect: Reduce the weight of the backpacks you and your team carries carry by 5* Tier KG.

spells.description: This spell is ignored by the novice adventurers until their first long distance mission when those extra 20kg of pelts or 20 daily rations would have felt amazing.  The need for the spell disappears when they are rich enough for spacial bags, and it becomes disregarded again.

spells.name: Light Feet
spells.shortDescription: Ignore difficult terrain while traveling

basic.effect: Mage ignores difficult terrain while traveling

advanced.effect: Team ignores difficult terrain while traveling

spells.name: Loud Mouth
spells.shortDescription: Amplify your voice significantly

basic.effect: Amplify your voice 5 times

spells.name: Message
spells.shortDescription: Create a telepathic communication

basic.effect: 30m telepathic whisper, ignores range and visibility reqs for team members

spells.name: Minor Disruption
spells.shortDescription: Disrupt a duration spell within range

basic.effect: Attempt to disrupt a duration spell within 10 meters, DC=10+CastersBonus, doesn't work on spells in limits

spells.name: Minor Elemental Manipulation
spells.shortDescription: Produce or manipulate small amounts of elements

basic.effect: 1d3 damage if used offensively. Doesn't scale. Can produce flame, water, acid, move earth/stone, cool drinks.

spells.name: Minor Telekinesis
spells.shortDescription: Telekinetic manipulation of small objects

basic.effect: 2kg max, 10m range, 2 meters per AP, hard to aim to drop things

spells.name: Phantom Tools
spells.shortDescription: Create phantom tools for a skill you have

basic.effect: Create phantom tools for a skill you have

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.shortDescription: Minor magical effects for cleaning, flavoring, and coloring

basic.effect: Cosmetic effects

spells.name: Resistance
spells.shortDescription: Minor protection from one damage type

basic.effect: -1 damage from chosen type

spells.name: Sad violin
spells.shortDescription: Play ambient musical composition for the scene

basic.effect: Play prerecorded musical composition as ambient music for the scene

spells.name: Stabilize
spells.shortDescription: Conduct magical first aid

basic.effect: First aid

spells.name: Wish-em Good Luck
spells.shortDescription: Give advantage to an ally.

basic.effect: The ally's next roll is affected by Good #Luck

spells.description: People talk a lot, and mages are no exception. To use this spell you must mean it. Learning this spell is considered a funny challenge in magical community, but not all pass. It requires to speak what you mean for a day while actively interacting with other people. If you lie or say something you don't believe in, the you need to start all over.

spells.name: Alarming Wards
spells.shortDescription: Cover small area with a movement detection spell.

basic.effect: Cover a 20m^2  or a 15m radius area in movement detection ward.

spells.description: Bread and butter of adventurers and bodyguards. Despite its common use and relative ease of detection by trained thieves and assassins this is a one of the pillars of security systems. Note from author: Dear adventurers, if your travel in the wilderness and your support mage doesn't know this spell - you need to find another one.

spells.name: Alter Shape
spells.shortDescription: Adjust facial features and body shape to impersonate others

basic.effect: You change your visuals. You can't change the body mass. This doesn't hide the voices acting skills and similar. This provides +3 to Fast-Talk and Acting trying to impersonate into a role.

advanced.effect: You change your and your team members visuals. You can't change the body mass. This doesn't hide the voices acting skills and similar. This provides +3 to Fast-Talk and Acting trying to impersonate into a role.

spells.description: The Bread and Butter of spies, thieves and actors. While it is not illegal to change one's shape, impersonation is illegal and most wealthy and some well-off establishments have wards against transformation and illusion spells, highlighting the illusion for all present.

spells.name: Animate Appliance
spells.shortDescription: Animate household appliances to do simple menial labor

basic.effect: Animate a number of appliances equal to your Spellcraft to do the work for you.

spells.description: Animate Appliance is the favorite tool in poor students', pathological loners and disenfranchised nobles' hands. This spell will do the untrained monotonous labor worse than any professional cleaner or a maid, but maids are expensive and you are cheap.

spells.name: Aura of Speed
spells.shortDescription: Increase team movement speed

advanced.effect: +1 #Enhancement bonus to Speed to the team

spells.description: Reaching places in time is important. you should try it as well. With this spell your movement will be a breeze.

spells.name: Bestial Arms
spells.shortDescription: Grow claws and defensive arm covering

basic.effect: You get up to two 1d4 Unarmed or 1H weapons with #Light trait. You can parry with them.

spells.description: Basic transformation step on a way to become a furry beast. The utility of this spell is overrated, as a dagger is more versatile.  Authors note: I've only seen druids and furry pervs use this spell, and in Elzmeer we don't teach druidism. This spell won't count for exam qualifications.

spells.name: Binding Chains
spells.shortDescription: Bind target with magical chains to restrict movement

basic.effect: Target's speed is reduced to 1, Target can attempt to break the chain, which has Tier* 6 HP, or do a Break roll (breaking skill/MG vs Spellcraft) for 2AP.

spells.name: Elemental Strike
spells.shortDescription: Attack a target with chosen elemental damage

basic.effect: Spellcraft * 4d damage of chosen element on a hit

spells.description: The most versatile offensive spell out there. People enlarge it, make it into cones, rays, bursts and walls.

spells.name: Empower Weapons
spells.shortDescription: Empower weapons with magic for extra damage

basic.effect: Weapons of you deal +1 damage. This is an Equipment bonus.

advanced.effect: Weapons of your allies deal +1 damage

spells.name: Healing Aura
spells.shortDescription: Heal surface injuries of your team.

advanced.effect: Spellcraft HP of healing per turn for all allies. Heals first health then stamina damage. Stacks with similar healing effects.

spells.description: The main reason to have a mage in the group.

spells.name: Levitation
spells.shortDescription: Levitate targets to move them through the air

basic.effect: Each AP spent moves 1 target by 1m in the same direction. Any successful attack against you will require an Endure check or your ability to hold the spell falters.

advanced.effect: Each AP spent moves 1 target or the whole team by 1m in the same direction. Any successful attack against you will require an Endure check or your ability to hold the spell falters.

spells.name: Minor Curse
spells.shortDescription: Place minor inconvenient curses on enemies

basic.effect: Give your enemy digestive issues or a nasty pimple on the nose, make them stab their toe twice tomorrow, give them a few days of sexual dysfunction. This is a subtle spell, and someone without knowledge in arcane will not understand that you are cursing them not badmouthing. If they are roll opposed arcane check to hide the presence of the curse.

spells.name: Obscure
spells.shortDescription: Make yourself or team less noticeable from distance

basic.effect: All enemies 5m or further you roll contested stealth checks against roll with disadvantage

advanced.effect: All enemies 5m or further you roll contested stealth checks against roll with disadvantage

spells.name: Pest control
spells.shortDescription: Control pest population in a small area.

basic.effect: This ritual has 3 modes of operation.

spells.description: Decades ago the Elzmeer academy student developed this ritual to clean the dorm from pests, It was so efficient, that he dropped out of the academy, took a loan and opened his own business. Sadly, it was too good, and the city was cleansed of pests in a year. To avoid bankruptcy he lowered the spell intensity to just shoo the critters away into other houses. That wasn't enough to save his failing business venture. Thus, the reverse of the ritual was invented. It led to his execution a few weeks later.

spells.name: Profanity filter
spells.shortDescription: Counter curses and profanity by silencing offenders

basic.effect: When a creatures curses, tries to summon profane beings or casts a curse - you try to shut them up. Contest against their endure (if no magic) or spellcraft. On a success, they lose their actions spent to cast the spell and cannot speak until the end of their turn. If it was a curse or the target takes 3 damage as they bite their tongue.

spells.name: Simple barrier
spells.shortDescription: Place magical barriers to block or bridge

basic.effect: Barrier 1m² block can sustain 120KG of static pressure and take Spellcraft x d8 damage before crumbling. You can layer the barrier.

spells.name: Summon Skelly boys
spells.shortDescription: Summon skeleton minions for combat

advanced.effect: #TODO Summoning rules. I have the vision, just need to formalize it.

spells.name: Summon weapon
spells.shortDescription: Summon an ephemeral weapon that seeks blood

basic.effect: Summon an ephemeral weapon that you can use. You can only have 1. It disappears if removed from your hand. If there is no combat the weapon disappears. If you end up not using the weapon to attack until the end of the combat - the weapon strikes you with your modifier.

spells.duration: Until the end of the combat encounter.

spells.name: Telekinetic Maneuver
spells.shortDescription: Push, pull, or trip targets telekinetically

basic.effect: Contested check to perform a combat maneuver. On success the target is moved or prone.

spells.name: Tentacle arms
spells.shortDescription: Transform limbs into tentacles with extended reach

basic.effect: Your tentacles have reach 2m, but no fine manipulators. Removes manacles that don't prevent casting spells.

spells.duration: 1 shift, cannot be self dispelled. Because you don't have hands to dispell
